original_title: Sem Título #5: A Rotina Terá Seu Enquanto
overview: A double love tribute: to the final film by Yasujiro Ozu (1903-1963) ‘An Autumn Afternoon’ or ‘Sanma no Aji’ (1962) and ‘A Rising Sun That Painted My Horizon' (2018). An archival re-appropriation cine-poem. A found footage haiku.
title: Untitled #5: A Tune of Nones at Noon
